Portfolio

All about me

Hi there, I am Lee...
Front End Web Developer from London now based in Singapore.

With over 10 years experience in design and development I have spent the best part of the last 8 years in the fashion industry leading a small team of talented developers creating the many incarnations of jackwills.com.

Feeling a need for a change we (my wife and I) relocated to Singapore in search of new challenges and opportunities.

As a front end developer my technical skills include, but not limited to: HTML5, CSS3 (& LESS + Sass), Responsive Web Design (RWD), JADE, jQuery, Umbraco (Open Source CMS), Bootstrap, XSLT, Wordpress. Alongside my main skills I have had exposure to ASP.NET MVC, Javascript, PHP. I am also fully versed in the Adobe CS suite including video editing and encoding.

I am available for permanent work here in Singapore so if you have a role you think I would suit please download my most up to date CV/Resume and get in touch.

Around the Web

Copyright © iamleeadamson 2015

Jack Wills - 2008 > 2015

I worked at Jack Wills for just over 7 years, starting out as the lone front end develper working with 2 back end devs, over the years we created every incarnation of the JW websites (eCommerce and marketing). The team grow over the years and I progressed to Senior Front End Developer and when I left the company I was Senior Front End Developer and Team Lead.

I grew used to dealing with tight deadlines and having to react to trade meetings. There were a few key milestones along the way, Integrating an open source ASP.NET CMS (Umbraco), A responsive redesign and rebuild, Porting all CSS to LESS and migrating the back end and front end systems to a SAAS provider (Demandware). All this was done whilst having to cope with 7 seasonal site refreshes per year.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • LESS
  • XSLT
  • jQuery
  • UMBRACO
  • Team Management
  • Photoshop
  • Video Editing
  • Demandware
  • Grunt
  • Bower
  • Estimating
  • Employer: Jack Wills
  • Date: April 2008 - July 2015
  • Service: Web Development

FunkMartini.gr Mobile Enhancements

Based in Athens, Greece, FunkMartini tasked us at AppCake to take the existing site and apply mobile enhancements. Using mobile specific stylesheets and amending some JADE templates we have improved the customer experience for users on a mobile device

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Media Queries
  • JADE
  • jQuery
  • Client: FunkMartini
  • Date: 2015 Q1
  • Service: Web Development

Type Studio - London 2014

At AppCake we were approached by a start up Architects firm to create them a simple quick website showcasing their projects. We created this site in short period of time to a very tight budget using wordpress as the platform to allow easy updating by the clients.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Media Queries
  • Wordpress
  • jQuery
  • WooCommerce
  • PHP
  • Client: Type Studio
  • Date: 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Telenumbers - 2013

I was approached to build a website for Telenumbers a UK based company selling premium rate and memorable phone numbers, they already had a static html site but they wanted a refresh and to be able to maintain the site themselves.

I implemented a basic design done by a third party designer, made some alterations along the way and built the site using wordpress which would give them the control they wanted. I also implemented WooCommerce to allow them to be able to take web orders.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Media Queries
  • Wordpress
  • jQuery
  • WooCommerce
  • PHP
  • Client: Telenumbers
  • Date: 2013
  • Service: Web Development

Aubin & Wills - 2008 > 2012

Aubin & Wills was the sister brand to Jack Wills. Started in 2008 it was branded and targeted at an older demographic to Jack Wills.

I helped build the initial site and every version of the website that came about until unfortunately in 2012 the business decided to pull the plug on the sister brand to concentrate on the core business.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • XSLT
  • jQuery
  • UMBRACO
  • Team Management
  • Photoshop
  • Video Editing
  • Estimating
  • Employer: Aubin & Wills (Jack Wills)
  • Date: April 2008 - August 2012
  • Service: Web Development
